IVXMBA.en:

That is all..

M1XMBA.en:
[Lothus]
Long long time ago..
There was a man 
who decided to make a new hat.
But that is unusual hat. 
All people want to get it. 
Just like that kind of hat.
M1XMBA.pt:
[Lothus]
Long long time ago..
There was a man 
who decided to make a new hat.
But that is unusual hat. 
All people want to get it. 
Just like that kind of hat.

NFXMBA.en:
[Lothus]
He had started to travel 
to find the unique materials. 
Finally 40 years later he found 
a black of ancient book.
A black of ancient book which is written with red and gold.
He started to read the book. 
When he feels getting stranger, tried to stop reading. 
But he realized that it's late.
